<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Arcane Communication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3091) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Automaton" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=398" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 40</row>

</column>

---

You can deliver silent messages. You gain [touch telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37), allowing you to communicate silently and mentally with any creature you're touching, as long as you share a language.

**Enhancement** You can send your messages even further. Your telepathy gains a range of 10 feet, but you still have to share a language with your target.
name: Arcane Communication
